item.title: ICE arrests over 32,000 migrants in US illegally in 1st 50 days
item.description: ICE has arrested over 32,000 migrants who are living in the United States without legal status since Jan. 21, according to Department of Homeland Secu...

item.title: US to require Canadians in America for over 30 days to register with government
item.description: Canadians in the U.S. for 30 days or longer will soon have to register their information with the U.S. government, according to a notice obtained by A...

item.description: At least one person has been shot outside Chicago O'Hare International Airport early Wednesday morning, police said.

item.title: Stock market teeters amid trade war, recession fears
item.description: An escalating global trade war hammered markets in recent days.

item.title: WATCH: Baby plays 'flying peekaboo' and it's the cutest thing you'll see today
item.description: Roslyn Witter said she got the "serotonin boost" she needed watching her young son giggle as he flew through the air.
